Pegadata

Big data for a safer world and better tomorrow

About Pegadata

We are a group of big data veterans.

A year ago, we founded Pegadata to help organizations unleash the power of data for their most critical missions.

Now, the clients are using Pegadata products to solve problems that were once thought as unsolvable.

Our team

We are engineers, designers, project managers and data scientists.

We graduated from top universities in China and US.

We have worked in big data field for years in all types of companies, from start-ups to multinationals.

We are looking for talented people to work with.
